name: Enlightened (JakeIsDev)
description:
Start with nothing and explore to create something ;)

The art and sound design borrows heavy inspiration from Untitled Goose Game. 

Controls: Press WASD to move.

Credits

Tom Adams - Digital Art
Jacob Beimers - Programming (https://twitter.com/JakeIsDev)
Craig Burgress - Audio

Created for Ludum Dare 45

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/enlightened
